column5: My Habs lost too     I didn't know how this would effect slower connections if I posted to Basskicker's thread..  Couple have been posted before.
Very nice! Love the one with all the moss. Thanks.
Great pics. Thanks
Wow!  Thanks for posting those Northhunter.  I Also love the Moss pic.
Great looking pics.  I love those where the sky is 'on fire'.   Really cool
Those are sweet...never get bored of beautiful sunsets. Thanks for sharing  Jason
very nice scenery pics,every time i see pics of lakes or rivers i picture myself in my boat and wonder what kind of fish would be there,keep them pics comming.....cheers

Amazing pics Northhunter!  Very crisp picture too.  They are all amazing, but I have to say, the pic of the forest with all the moss and the island pic have to be my favourites.  Nice job!  Would love to see more.
Great pictures! I miss seeing the rocky shorelines!

Fabulous stuff Northunter! I agree, the picture with the moss is very cool. There's a portage on the Lookout River n/w of Armstrong called "fantasia" portage....very cool, it looks strikingly similar to your picture.

Stunning!  I haven't seen much of Canada but through pictures like yours and other members, I often feel like I have taken a little tour of all the beautiful places this country has to offer.  Thank you for sharing these, mind if I save a few to my computer?  bly
Where is that place, NorthHunter?  Makes me itch for Opeongo and Algonquin park.
Beautiful pictures Northhunter, infact, it's hard tp pick out the best !!
the pics help the day dreaming.
Very nice pics. The Moss in the bush is excellent.  Larry
Aaaah, the moss one is begging to be painted.  Pam
Great pics, thanks, helps while the winter blues are still around.

Thanks for the comments! I usually take more than one of the same shot, and pick out the best. The "moss" pic was an exception. We were tracking a bear up near Red Lake and I had to stop and take out the camera for a quick pic. The "island" and "dock" shots are from the same trip.  The rest are mostly from Nipissing.  Bly - go ahead. I have full-size versions if you'd prefer.  I have others, but a lot of them are from film and would need to be scanned.
that moss pic is sweet!  cheers
Awesome pics thanks for sharing.
Awesome!
